item.title: Samsung Galaxy M54 5G: Android 13, 8 GB RAM, other features
item.description: Samsung Galaxy M54 5G: Android 13, 8 GB RAM, other features Samsung Galaxy M54 5G India Launch Date: The Samsung Galaxy M54 5G is expected to launch in India in the first half of 2023.

item.title: Twitter Not Safer Under Elon Musk, Says Former Head of Trust and Safety
item.description: Twitter Not Safer Under Elon Musk, Says Former Head of Trust and Safety Twitter's former head of trust and safety Yoel Roth on Tuesday said the social media company was not safer under new owner Elon Musk, warning in his first interview since resigning this month that the company no longer had enough staff for safety work.

item.title: ZTE Launched 6G Key Technology Research and Registered for Related Patents
item.description: ZTE Launched 6G Key Technology Research and Registered for Related Patents Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE announced that the firm tethers the utmost importance to research and development investments; as part of the process, the company ultimately joined forces to provide a place where we can connect with a 6G network from a sitting at the park.

item.title: Next Year’s iPhone 15 Ultra Could Cost More Than iPhone 14 Pro Max
item.description: Next Year’s iPhone 15 Ultra Could Cost More Than iPhone 14 Pro Max Apple is going to make a slew of changes with next year's iPhone 15 series, which could see the arrival of a new Ultra variant that could push the price levels further.

item.title: Musk Says Twitter to Soon Enable Organizations to Identify Their Associated Accounts
item.description: Musk Says Twitter to Soon Enable Organizations to Identify Their Associated Accounts Twitter's billionaire owner Elon Musk on Sunday said that Twitter will soon enable organizations to identify twitter accounts associated with them as the new Twitter owner continues to find ways to limit fake accounts on the platform.

item.title: Here’s How Much Apple Has Spent On Its SOS Emergency Satellite Feature For iPhones
item.description: Here’s How Much Apple Has Spent On Its SOS Emergency Satellite Feature For iPhones Apple introduced the new satellite connectivity feature on the iPhone 14 series, but the company has spent big to get this technology working.

item.title: Apple to change the ‘Hey Siri’ voice assistant command to just ‘Siri’
item.description: Apple to change the ‘Hey Siri’ voice assistant command to just ‘Siri’ Looks like Apple wants to change the “Hey Siri” trigger phrase to just “Siri”, according to a report from Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman.
